title: ‘It Is Going to Be a Good Battle’: Vingegaard vs Evenepoel in All-Out Scrap for Second Place at Tour de France
content:
With Pogačar appearing set for Tour de France win, furious battle is in store for second overall in Nice on Sunday.

Read the full article at ‘It Is Going to Be a Good Battle’: Vingegaard vs Evenepoel in All-Out Scrap for Second Place at Tour de France on Velo.
author: sstokes
